summary.description: The symposium focuses on operationalizing intelligent agents and intelligent systems which integrate large language models for various applications.

program_overview.June 17, 2025: AgentOps Day - Keynotes, sessions, and discussions focused on operationalizing intelligent agents.
program_overview.June 18, 2025: Intelligent Systems - Presentations, expert talks, and discussions on AI-enhanced systems and sustainability.
program_overview.June 19, 2025: Tutorials and SEMTL Meeting - Hands-on tutorials and the SEMTL meeting.

poster_contribution.details: Poster presentations related to SEMLA topics; accepted posters to be presented in a dedicated session with eligibility for travel grants or best poster prizes.
